t really mind about the parts too much, what really makes the set bad is the down grade. The shoulder armor was re-used for the Breakout evo, the legs are kind of a bit down graded in my opinion, but the parts are very movable. Evo&#39

Building Experience: The building experience is pretty easy, and also a bit repetitive. It goes by pretty quick so that is nice. The guy it'
column2: s self looks great for the Hero Factory line, but out of that and Bionicle&nbsp

column1: Parts: There are some good parts in this 51-piece set. Bionicle pieces usually are hard to use in anything other than Bionicle so it is nice that not all of these are Bionicle. There are some nice tooth pieces and some good technic pieces. About all the others are Bionicle.
Playability: Playability with Hero Factory and Bionicle are never ending. There are so many things that can happen with an imagination and a Hero Factory

column3: 7.99 / $9.99 and had 51 pieces. Judging that the pieces are genuinely all big it makes sense that it would cost this price. It also has a number on the back of the hero symbol for a game.

column2: t like Bionicle or Hero Factory then this is not the set for you and it is just another Hero Factory Guy. If you do like those than this is a perfect set for you.
